description: This file declares the 'DobbySpecGenerator' class, which is responsible for generating runtime specifications for containerized applications, including methods for creating environment variables, mounts, plugins, and handling configuration details related to runtime environments.

classes.name: DobbySpecGenerator
classes.description: A class responsible for generating container runtime specifications, including environment variables, mounts, plugins, and other configuration details.

methods.name: generate
methods.description: Main method to generate the runtime specification JSON string based on provided application and runtime configurations.

methods.name: createEnvVars
methods.description: Creates environment variables section for the runtime specification.

methods.name: createMounts
methods.description: Creates mounts configuration for the runtime.

methods.name: createRdkPlugins
methods.description: Creates RDK-specific plugins configuration.

methods.name: createMinidumpPlugin
methods.description: Creates configuration for minidump plugin.

methods.name: createAppServiceSDKPlugin
methods.description: Creates AppService SDK plugin configuration.

methods.name: createNetworkPlugin
methods.description: Creates network plugin configuration.

methods.name: createBindMount
methods.description: Creates a bind mount configuration from source to destination with options.

methods.name: shouldEnableGpu
methods.description: Determines if GPU should be enabled based on configuration.

methods.name: getSysMemoryLimit
methods.description: Retrieves system memory limit for the runtime.

methods.name: getGPUMemoryLimit
methods.description: Retrieves GPU memory limit for the runtime.

methods.name: getVpuEnabled
methods.description: Checks if VPU (Video Processing Unit) is enabled.

methods.name: getCpuCores
methods.description: Retrieves information about CPU cores available.

methods.name: populateClassicPlugins
methods.description: Populates plugins related to classic configurations.

methods.name: createEthanLogPlugin
methods.description: Creates Ethanol logging plugin configuration.

methods.name: createMulticastSocketPlugin
methods.description: Creates multicast socket plugin configuration.

methods.name: createIonMemoryPlugin
methods.description: Creates Ion memory plugin configuration.

methods.name: createThunderPlugin
methods.description: Creates Thunder plugin configuration.

methods.name: createOpenCDMPlugin
methods.description: Creates Open Content Decryption Module (CDM) plugin configuration.

methods.name: createPrivateDataMount
methods.description: Creates private data mount configuration.

methods.name: createFkpsMounts
methods.description: Creates Fkps mounts for the specification.

methods.name: createTmpfsMount
methods.description: Creates tmpfs mount configuration.

methods.name: createResourceManagerMount
methods.description: Creates resource manager mount.

methods.name: getWorkingDir
methods.description: Retrieves working directory configuration.

methods.name: initialiseIonHeapsJson
methods.description: Initializes Ion heaps JSON configuration.

methods.name: encodeURL
methods.description: Encodes URLs for safety or formatting.

methods.name: addHolePunchPortToSpec
methods.description: Adds hole punch port configuration to the specification.
